title: Project-Based Learning Design Founded on Critical Multilingual Awareness

context.prior_knowledge: Basic job-related social knowledge and intermediate multilingual comprehension skills
context.additional_context: Enhancing communication skills using multilingual resources through social sector projects for employees working in multicultural environments

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with peers from diverse linguistic backgrounds to solve social issues through project-based learning
Learners can analyze and incorporate the sociocultural context of language choices based on critical thinking
Learners can collect and analyze multilingual materials using digital tools and apply them to project deliverables
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
